arts.ttl: Motherwell warm up for Hampden trip by beating Dundee United
arts.sum: Motherwell ensured they will head into their Premier Sports Cup semi-final in high spirits after seeing off Dundee United 2-0 at Fir Park.

Motherwell and Dundee United both returned to winning ways at the weekend, ahead of their midweek meeting in the Scottish Premiership at Fir Park. The Well clinched just a second Scottish Premiership...

arts.ttl: Luca Stephenson set for Dundee United return in Motherwell clash despite nasty injury
arts.sum: On-loan Luca Stephenson is expected to be in Jim Goodwin's squad for the trip to Motherwell.
